name: led.run
description: A browser-based display toolkit that turns any screen into a LED sign, light effect, sound visualizer, clock, QR code, or camera filter. Supports dozens of themes and modes — no app, no account, just a URL.
coreTask: Display scrolling text, light effects, sound visualizers, clocks, QR codes, and camera filters — all directly in the browser without any login or account

name: nologin.tools
description: A curated directory of tools and services that work without creating an account or logging in. Browse, search, and filter tools by category, privacy, pricing, and more — all without registration.
coreTask: Browse and search the full directory of no-login tools, filter by category and tags, view tool details
